description: This file defines a CsvTools class that provides methods for listing CSV files, reading CSV contents, retrieving CSV columns, and querying CSV files using DuckDB. It is part of a larger project involving data processing and manipulation.

classes.name: CsvTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for handling CSV files, including listing, reading, and querying CSV data.

methods.name: list_csv_files
methods.description: Returns a JSON string listing the stem names of all CSV files loaded.

methods.name: read_csv_file
methods.description: Reads and returns the contents of a specified CSV file, limited by row count if provided.

methods.name: get_columns
methods.description: Retrieves and returns the column headers of a specified CSV file.

methods.name: query_csv_file
methods.description: Executes a SQL query on a specified CSV file using DuckDB and returns the results.
